text: Arra to sono shito ni taishite tatakai, matawa chijo o kakuran shite aruku mono no oho wa, korosa reru ka, matawa jujika ni tsuke rareru ka, aruiwa teashi o tagaichigai ni setsudan sa reru ka, matawa kokudo kara tsuiho sa reru soto wanai. Korera wa kare-ra ni totte wa gense de no kutsujokudeari, sarani raise ni oite kibishi chobatsu ga aru
